title: OpenAI GPT-5 Released
summary: OpenAI announces GPT-5, a significant leap in reasoning and coding capabilities. Achieves state-of-the-art performance on SWE-bench (approaching 90%), competitive programming, and graduate-level science. Demonstrates improved agentic capabilities for multi-step tasks.

title: Claude 4.5 Sonnet Thinking
summary: Anthropic releases Claude 4.5 Sonnet with extended reasoning mode. Shows chain-of-thought capabilities similar to o1, with improved performance on coding benchmarks, mathematical reasoning, and complex multi-step problems. Introduces new Thinking mode for transparent reasoning traces.

title: Claude 4 Opus Released
summary: Anthropic announces Claude 4 Opus, their most capable model. Significant improvements in reasoning, coding, and scientific analysis. Excels at agentic tasks and tool use.

title: OpenAI Announces o3 Reasoning Model
summary: OpenAI previews o3, next generation reasoning model showing major advances on ARC-AGI benchmark and competitive mathematics. Demonstrates improved planning and problem decomposition.

title: Google Gemini Ultra 2.0
summary: Google DeepMind releases Gemini Ultra 2.0 with breakthrough performance on coding, reasoning, and multimodal tasks. Native agentic capabilities and improved tool use.

title: Meta Llama 4 405B
summary: Meta releases Llama 4 405B, their most capable open model. Competitive with proprietary frontier models on coding, reasoning, and instruction following. Significant improvements in multi-turn conversation and agentic capabilities.

title: Anthropic Announces $7B Funding Round
summary: Anthropic raises $7B to scale compute infrastructure and safety research. Plans include training runs exceeding 10^26 FLOPs and expanded AI safety testing frameworks.

title: Microsoft and OpenAI Announce $100B Datacenter Project
summary: Joint announcement of 'Stargate' datacenter project requiring multiple gigawatts of power. Aimed at training next-generation AI models with compute budgets approaching 10^27 FLOPs.

title: xAI Grok 2 with Real-Time Data
summary: xAI releases Grok 2 with real-time X (Twitter) integration. Shows strong performance on coding and reasoning benchmarks with unique real-time knowledge capabilities.

title: DeepSeek-V3 Achieves Competitive Performance
summary: Chinese AI lab DeepSeek releases V3 model claiming GPT-4 level performance at fraction of training cost. Demonstrates algorithmic efficiency improvements and mixture-of-experts architecture advances.

title: Anthropic Claude 3.5 Sonnet (Updated)
summary: Anthropic releases updated Claude 3.5 Sonnet with improved performance on coding and agentic tasks. Shows significant gains on SWE-bench and multi-step reasoning.

title: OpenAI o1-preview Expanded Access
summary: OpenAI expands access to o1-preview model, showing advanced reasoning on mathematics, coding, and science. Early testing shows promising results on competitive programming and theorem proving.

title: Google AI Achieves Breakthrough on Protein Folding
summary: Google DeepMind announces AlphaFold 3 with ability to predict protein-ligand interactions. While not directly AGI-related, demonstrates continued progress in applying AI to complex scientific problems.

title: Meta Releases Llama 3.2 Vision Models
summary: Meta introduces Llama 3.2 with vision capabilities, enabling multimodal understanding. 11B and 90B models show competitive performance on vision-language tasks.

title: Anthropic Publishes AI Safety Levels Framework
summary: Anthropic releases detailed Anthropic Safety Levels (ASL) framework, defining capability thresholds and corresponding safety measures for increasingly powerful AI systems. ASL-3 triggers defined for models approaching autonomous replication capabilities.

title: OpenAI Preparedness Framework Update
summary: OpenAI publishes updated Preparedness Framework with enhanced risk categories for cybersecurity, chemical/biological threats, and autonomous AI capabilities. Introduces new Medium-High risk thresholds requiring additional safeguards.

title: NVIDIA H200 GPUs Shipping at Scale
summary: NVIDIA announces H200 Tensor Core GPUs now shipping to major cloud providers and AI labs. Enables larger training runs with improved memory bandwidth for trillion-parameter models.

title: Mistral Large 2
summary: Mistral AI releases Large 2 with 123B parameters. Shows strong performance on coding and multilingual tasks, competitive with larger proprietary models on many benchmarks.

title: Google Announces Project Astra
summary: Google DeepMind previews Project Astra, a universal AI agent designed for real-time multimodal understanding and task completion. Demonstrates prototype capabilities for extended autonomous operation.

title: Meta Announces AI Research Supercluster Expansion
summary: Meta expands AI Research SuperCluster to include 600,000 H100-equivalent GPUs. Aims to support training runs approaching 10^26-10^27 FLOP range for next-generation models.

title: Cohere Command R7B Released
summary: Cohere releases Command R7B optimized for RAG and tool use. Shows strong performance on business applications and enterprise deployment scenarios.
